info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 10 at 5:07PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin...
Fox River Lower At Waukesha affecting Waukesha County.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin...
Cedar Creek At Cedarburg affecting Ozaukee County.
Menomonee River At Wauwatosa affecting Milwaukee County.
Milwaukee River Near Cedarburg affecting Ozaukee County.
Milwaukee River At Milwaukee affecting Milwaukee County.
Root River At Franklin affecting Milwaukee County.
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Wisconsin...
Oak Creek At South Milwaukee affecting Milwaukee County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. This approaches the flood of record.
* WHERE...Milwaukee River at Milwaukee.
* WHEN...Until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Floodwaters affect property along Port Washington Road including the Hilton Hotel.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:30 PM CDT Sunday was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.2 feet on 04/09/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 615 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
